summary: During 1941 in Belgrade, two well-known thieves try to carry out the biggest robbery of Nazi authorities ever.
cast: Dragan Nikolic|Nikola Djuricko|Katarina Zutic|Isidora Minic|Vojin Cetkovic|Katarina Radivojevic|Predrag Ejdus|Tihomir Stanic|Bogdan Diklic|Milorad Mandic-Manda|Mihajlo 'Bata' Paskaljevic|Goran Danicic|Dragomir Cumic|Vlasta Velisavljevic|Josif Tatic|Sloboda Micalovic|Aleksandar Marinkovic|Slobodan Tesic|Mladen Nedeljkovic|Slobodan Ljubicic|Dejan Cicmilovic|Dejana Miladinovic|Jovan Ristovski|Alek Rodic|Jasminka Hodzic|Danica Zdravic|Aleksandar Mihailovic|Milos Andjelkovic|Aleksandar Krstic|Vladimir Posavec|Ratko Miletic|Milutin Micovic|Srdjan Rajsic|Ras Rastoder|Dragoljub Markovic|Ninoslav Djordjevic|Aleksandar Mitic|Slavoljub Plavsic-Zvonce|Maks Celic|Predrag Panic|Predrag Koraja|Milana Vranesevic|Radoje Jelic|Miodrag Kostic|Miodrag Rakocevic|Danko Rapajic
title: Pljacka Treceg rajha
